description: A clever little book that tells you some neat tricks using the natural environment.
Interspersed with weeaboo stories that would make a 5chan board sarcastically clap, you find some surprisingly detailed notes on a few specific techniques. But there's no chance they work... right?

A collection of haikus detailing the importance of swiftness when wielding a blade, as well as how to apply the philosophy more generally. Just as the descriptions of the techniques are concise, so must your strikes be.
A historical text on the importance of the swordsman being just as strong and sturdy as his blade, complete with illustrations and proverbs.
